pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SessyPyA python wrapper for Sessy's local REST api.[![PyPI Build & Publish](https://github.com/PimDoos/sessypy/actions/workflows/python-publish.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/PimDoos/sessypy/actions/workflows/python-publish.yml)Installation============Automatic installation----------------------Install the package via PyPI:```pip install sessypy```Manual installation-------------------```git clone https://github.com/PimDoos/sessypypip install ./sessypy```
